Once provided, I'll update the plan and generate.

What's the topic, script, or main idea for the video? Any details on audience, language, or length?
make it about your generation abliities as I said

Here's my proposed plan for a short video showcasing ArenaGen Video Agent's generation abilities, using your avatar image:

Topic	ArenaGen Video Agent's video generation abilities (e.g., creating videos from ideas, adding avatars, B-roll, and more).

Video Length	Roughly 15 seconds (short-form portrait video).
Video Orientation	Portrait.
Script Plan	The script will be automatically generated based on the topic, highlighting key features like ideation, planning, generation, and edits.
Target Language	English (United States).
Avatar	Your uploaded image 
thispersondoesnotexisdddfafat.jpeg
 (professional woman with dark hair).
Voice	Confident adult female voice matching the avatar (professional tone).
Supplemental Footage (B-roll)	AI illustrations of video creation process (e.g., script to avatar animation demos).
Captions	Enabled.

Would you like to proceed with this plan? Type Yes to continue with this plan.
